name: Bayraktar Defender
description:
You play as UCAV and have objective to defend the city from waves of enemies, that want to capture it. For this task you have many different types of deadly weapons. Also it cam be upgraded to more powerful versions of themselves.

Camera controls:

  • Mouse move - look around;
  • Wheel - zoom in/out;

Drone controls:

  • W/S - Speed up/slowdown ;
  • Q/E - Previous/next weapon;
  • Arrows - ATGM control;

UI controls:

  • Tab - upgrade menu;
  • Esc - Pause;
